Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if StopRota then StopRota = false PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFF15E615reenabled!") else StopRota = true PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFFE61515stopped!") end end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if AoE then AoE = false PQR_WriteToChat("Single: \124cFFE61515Enabled") else AoE = true PQR_WriteToChat("AoE: \124cFF15E615Enabled") end end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if Stealth then Stealth = false PQR_WriteToChat("Stealth + Garrote: \124cFFE61515Disabled") else Stealth = true PQR_WriteToChat("Stealth + Garrote: \124cFF15E615Enabled") end end
if not AOE then function AOE() if AoE == true then return true else return false end end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 21892, 40733 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy" } local elite = { "Overlord Ror", "Ragepaw", "Liam", "Galleon" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil local eliteboss = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end
for i,v in ipairs(elite) do if UnitName("target") == v then eliteboss = 1 end end
IsBoss = nil function IsBoss() if UnitExists("target") and ( UnitLevel("target") == -1 or eliteboss ) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Use:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: All:Poison
Ability.Lua:
if applypoison and GetTime() - applypoison > 4 then applypoison = nil end
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and applypoison == nil then
local activepoisons = { "43231", "43233" } local _,poisonMH,_,_,poisonOH,_,_,poisonTR = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() applypoison = GetTime()
if poisonMH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[1],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end elseif poisonOH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(17) end end end

Ability.Name: All:Tricks of the Trade
Ability.Lua: if threat("player") >= 2 and UnitExists("focus") and UnitInRange("focus") and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57934), "focus") == 1 and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus") then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Stealth
Ability.Lua: if Stealth == true and IsMounted() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: C:Adrenaline Rush
Ability.Lua:
local energy = UnitPower("player")
if IsBoss() and energycost(13750) and UnitExists("target") and energy < 30 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48668), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: C:Eviscerate
Ability.Lua:
local cp = GetComboPoints("player") local snd, _, _, _, _, _, sndtime = UnitBuffID("player", 6774) local hunger = UnitBuffID("player", 63848) local bleed, _, _, _, _, _, btime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player") local energy = UnitPower("player")
if energycost(48668) and valid("target", 48668) --and spender("eviscerate") and AOE() == false then
if cp == 5 and hunger and bleed and snd then return true end if cp >= 4 and snd and energy > 40 and bleed then return true end if cp == 5 and calc_time ~= nil and calc_time < 10 then return true end
end

Ability.Name: C:Sinister Strike
Ability.Lua:
local cp = GetComboPoints("player")
if energycost(48638) and AOE() == false and UnitExists("target") and valid("target", 48638) and cp < 4 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48638), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: C:Blade Flurry
Ability.Lua: if IsBoss() and energycost(13877) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48668), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: C:Killing Spree
Ability.Lua:
local energy = UnitPower("player")
if IsBoss() and energycost(51690) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48668), "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 13750) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Hunger For Blood
Ability.Lua:
local hob, _, _, _, _, _, hobtime = UnitBuffID("player", 63848) local bleed = UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player") or UnitDebuffID("target", 48676, "player")
if energycost(51662) and bleed and ( hob == nil or ( hob and hobtime - GetTime() < 2 ) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Garrote
Ability.Lua:
local Stealthed = UnitBuffID("player", 1784)
if Stealth == true and IsStealthed() and UnitExists("target") and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48676), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Cold Blood
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Envenom
Ability.Lua:
local envenom = UnitBuffID("player", 57993) local cp = GetComboPoints("player") local snd, _, _, _, _, _, sndtime = UnitBuffID("player", 6774) local deadly = UnitDebuffID("target", 57970, "player") local hunger = UnitBuffID("player", 63848) local bleed = UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player") local energy = UnitPower("player")
if energycost(57993) and AOE() == false --and spender("envenom") and valid("target", 57993) and deadly and (hunger and bleed ) or ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time <= 15 ) then
if cp >= 4 and envenom == nil then return true end if cp >= 4 and energy > 90 then return true end if cp >= 2 and ( snd and sndtime - GetTime() < 2 ) then return true end end

Ability.Name: A:Mutilate
Ability.Lua:
local cp = GetComboPoints("player")
if energycost(48666) and UnitExists("target") and valid("target", 48666) and cp < 4 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48666), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Slice and Dice
Ability.Lua:
local snd, _, _, _, _, _, sndtime = UnitBuffID("player", 6774) local cp = GetComboPoints("player")
if energycost(6774) and cp > 0 and ( snd == nil or ( snd and sndtime - GetTime() < 1 ) ) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48638), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Rupture
Ability.Lua:
local cp = GetComboPoints("player") local snd, _, _, _, _, _, sndtime = UnitBuffID("player", 6774) local bleed,_,_,_,_,_,btime = UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player")
if energycost(48672) and valid("target", 48672) and UnitExists("target") and cp == 5 and ( bleed == nil or ( bleed and btime-GetTime() < 2 ) ) and ( calc_time == nil or ( calc_time ~= nil and calc_time > 15 ) ) and AOE() == false and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48672), "target") == 1 and snd then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Expose Armor
Ability.Lua:
local cp = GetComboPoints("player") local ea,_,_,_,_,_,eatime = UnitDebuffID("target", 8647)
if UnitExists("target") and valid("target", 8647) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(8647), "target") == 1 and energycost(8647) and AOE() == false and cp > 4 and ( ea == nil or (ea and eatime - GetTime() < 2 ) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: C:Fan of Knives
Ability.Lua: if AOE() == true and energycost(51723) and UnitExists("target") and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48638), "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- DarhangeR --
Ability.Lua: -- I'm the original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: -- VK: https://vk.com/darhanger -- FB: https://fb.com/darhanger -- E-mail: civayan@gmail.com

Ability.Name: All:Racial
Ability.Lua:
if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 5782) --Fear end if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 8122) --Psychic scream end if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 5484) --Howl of Terror end if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 2637) --Hibernate end if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 5246) --Intimidating Shout end if pvpdebuffCheck == nil then pvpdebuffCheck, _, _, _, _, _, expire = UnitDebuffID("player", 6358) --Seduction end if pvpdebuffCheck ~= nil then if (expire - GetTime()) >= 4 then if UnitRace("player") == "Undead" and IsSpellKnown(7744) and not CooldownRemains(7744) then CastSpellByID(7744) return true end end end
if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and UnitExists("target") then --Troll Berserking-- if UnitRace("player") == "Troll" and IsSpellKnown(26297) and not CooldownRemains(26297) then CastSpellByID(26297) return true end --Orc Blood Fury 2-- if UnitRace("player") == "Orc" and IsSpellKnown(20572) and not CooldownRemains(20572) then CastSpellByID(20572) return true end --Orc Blood Fury-- if UnitRace("player") == "Orc" and IsSpellKnown(33697) and not CooldownRemains(33697) then CastSpellByID(33697) return true end end
if UnitExists("target") then --Dwarf Stoneform-- if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 40 and UnitRace("player") == "Dwarf" and IsSpellKnown(20594) and not CooldownRemains(20594) then CastSpellByID(20594) return true end --Draenei-- if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 40 and UnitRace("player") == "Draenei" and IsSpellKnown(28880) and not CooldownRemains(28880) then CastSpellByID(28880) return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Stats Buffs / Flask --
Ability.Lua:
if NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then NoKings = true --else --NoKings = false end end end end
if not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") then
-- Voter Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and NoKings == true then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Donor Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35874) then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 27 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Drums of the WIld -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 48470) and not UnitBuffID("player", 48469) and not UnitBuffID("player", 72588) then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 49634 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Kings Buff / Drums -- if GetZoneText() ~= "Scarlet Monastery" and not UnitBuffID("player", 43223) and not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and not UnitBuffID("player", 25898) and NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 49633 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end end
DPS = nil function DPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "DEATHKNIGHT" or playerClass == "HUNTER" or playerClass == "WARRIOR" or playerClass == "PALADIN" or playerClass == "ROGUE" then return true end end
SpellDPS = nil function SpellDPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "WARLOCK" or playerClass == "SHAMAN" or playerClass == "MAGE" or playerClass == "DRUID" or playerClass == "PRIEST" then return true end end
-- Elixir of Empowerment / 30 Spell Pen -- if SpellDPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 28514) then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 22848 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Lesser Flask of Resistance / 50 To All Resistance -- if DPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 62380) then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 44939 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end

Ability.Name: -- Interrupt Engine --
Ability.Lua:
-- New Interrupt Engine // Новый движок-- if xelperInterruptInit == nil then xelperInterruptInit = true function PQR_InterruptSpell() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "DEATHKNIGHT" then return 47528 elseif playerClass == "HUNTER" then return 34490 elseif playerClass == "MAGE" then return 2139 elseif playerClass == "PRIEST" then return 15487 elseif playerClass == "ROGUE" then return 1766 elseif playerClass == "SHAMAN" then return 57994 elseif playerClass == "WARRIOR" then local BattleStance = UnitBuffID("player", 2457) if BattleStance ~= nil then return 57755 else local DefensiveStance = UnitBuffID("player", 71) if DefensiveStance ~= nil then return 72 else local BerserkerStance = UnitBuffID("player", 2458) if BerserkerStance ~= nil then return 6552 else return 57755 end end end end end end
-- Сore / Ядро --
local customTarget = "target" local castName, _, _, _, castStartTime, castEndTime, _, _, castInterruptable = UnitCastingInfo(customTarget) local channelName, _, _, _, channelStartTime, channelEndTime, _, channelInterruptable = UnitChannelInfo(customTarget)
if channelName ~= nil then --target is channeling a spell that is interruptable --load the channel variables into the cast variables to make logic a little easier. castName = channelName castStartTime = channelStartTime castEndTime = channelEndTime castInterruptable = channelInterruptable end
--This is actually "Not Interruptable"... so lets swap it around to use in the positive. if castInterruptable == false then castInterruptable = true else castInterruptable = false end
--we can't attack the target. if UnitCanAttack("player", customTarget) == nil then return false end
if castInterruptable then --target is casting something that is interruptable. --the following 2 variables are named logically... value is in seconds. local timeSinceStart = (GetTime() * 1000 - castStartTime) / 1000 local timeLeft = ((GetTime() * 1000 - castEndTime) * -1) / 1000 local castTime = castEndTime - castStartTime local currentPercent = timeSinceStart / castTime * 100000
--interrupt percentage check if currentPercent < PQR_InterruptPercent then return false end
--minimum interrupt time. if timeSinceStart - PQR_InterruptDelay < 0 then return false end
--make sure the interrupt spell is available local interruptSpell = PQR_InterruptSpell() if interruptSpell ~= 0 then
local interruptName = GetSpellInfo(interruptSpell) if not PQR_SpellAvailable(interruptSpell) or not IsSpellInRange(interruptName, customTarget) then return false end else return false end
--Finally, make sure the spell they are casting is on the interrupt list or interrupt all is checked --if PQR_IsInterruptAll() then PQR_Debug("Casting interrupt on "..customTarget) CastSpellByID(interruptSpell, customTarget) return true --end
end
--PQR_InterruptStarted is a global flag to indicate that a new interrupt rotation has started.
if not PQR_InterruptStart then PQR_InterruptStart = true
--Only interrupt these abilities: --PQR_AddInterrupt("Holy Light") --PQR_AddInterrupt("Flash of Light") --PQR_AddInterrupt(GetSpellInfo(16914)) --Hurricane
--This is the delay before interrupting in seconds. PQR_InterruptDelay = 0.05
--This is the percentage of the cast to wait before interrupting PQR_InterruptPercent = math.random(30,60) end
if not spells then spells = { "Greater Heal", --Priest Heal "Penance", --Priest Direct channel heal "Flash Heal", --Priest quick big heal" "Heal", --Priest normal heal "Binding Heal", --Priest heal for themself and another "Lesser Heal", --Priest small heal "Prayer of Healing", --Priest AoE heal "Chain Heal", --Shaman AoE heal "Healing Wave", --Shaman heal "Lesser Healing Wave", --Shaman minor heal "Flash of Light", --Paladin quick heal "Holy Light", --Paladin small heal "Nourish", --Druid heals "Healing Touch", --Druid heal "Regrowth", --Druid AoE "Rebirth", --Druid brez "Tranquility", --Druid AoE heal "Hex", --Shaman CC "Cyclone", "Polymorph" } end

Ability.Name: -- Function --
Ability.Lua:
if not functionsloaded then
-- Combat Check -- function inCombat() if UnitAffectingCombat("player") ~= nil then return true end end
-- Get HP simple -- function getHp(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitHealth(unit) / UnitHealthMax(unit) end end
-- Calculate HP simple -- function CalculateHP(t) local ActualWithIncoming = 100 * UnitHealth(t) / UnitHealthMax(t) if ActualWithIncoming then return ActualWithIncoming else return 100 end end
-- Spell Cooldown remaining check -- CooldownRemains = nil function CooldownRemains(spell) local start, duration, enable = GetSpellCooldown(spell) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Amount of Cooldown that remains -- function cdRemains(spellid) if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) > 0 then return select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) else return 0 end end
-- Item Cooldown remaining check -- ItemCooldownRemains = nil function ItemCooldownRemains(item) local start, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(item) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Range Check Simple -- function rangeCheck(spellid,unit) if IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid),unit) == 1 then return true end end
-- Threat -- function threat(t) if UnitExists(t) and UnitThreatSituation(t) ~= nil then return UnitThreatSituation(t) else return 0 end end
function testv() return "\124cFF15E615DarhangeR original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9" end PQR_WriteToChat(testv())
-- Validator -- valid = nil function valid(t, spellid) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) and UnitCanAttack("player", t) == 1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 33786) == nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid), t) == 1 then return true else return false end end
-- CastSpell -- function _castSpell(spellid,tar) if UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil --and IsPlayerSpell(spellid) == true and cdRemains(spellid) == 0 then if tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == nil then return false elseif tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == true then CastSpellByID(spellid, tar) return true elseif tar == nil then CastSpellByID(spellid) return true else return false end end end
-- Tabled Cast Time Checking for When you Last Cast Something. CheckCastTime = {} Nova_CheckLastCast = nil function Nova_CheckLastCast(spellid, ytime) -- SpellID of Spell To Check, How long of a gap are you looking for? if ytime > 0 then if #CheckCastTime > 0 then for i=1, #CheckCastTime do if CheckCastTime[i].SpellID == spellid then if GetTime() - CheckCastTime[i].CastTime > ytime then CheckCastTime[i].CastTime = GetTime() return true else return false end end end end table.insert(CheckCastTime, { SpellID = spellid, CastTime = GetTime() } ) return true elseif ytime <= 0 then return true end return false end
-- Energy Check -- energycost = nil function energycost(spellid) local energy = UnitPower("player") if energy >= select(4, GetSpellInfo(spellid)) then return true else return false end end
-- Finish move -- spender = nil function spender(type) if type == "eviscerate" then if GetZoneText() == "Zul'Aman" or GetZoneText() == "Stranglethorn Vale" or GetZoneText() == "Vault of Archavon" or GetZoneText() == "The Shattered Halls" or GetZoneText() == "Naxxramas" or GetZoneText() == "Black Temple" or GetZoneText() == "The Molten Core" or GetZoneText() == "Icecrown Citadel" or GetZoneText() == "The Obsidian Sanctum" or GetZoneText() == "Drak'Tharon Keep" or GetZoneText() == "Scarlet Monastery" or GetZoneText() == "Trial of the Crusader" or GetZoneText() == "Ragefire Chasm" or GetZoneText() == "The Blood Furnace" or GetZoneText() == "Blackwing Lair" or GetZoneText() == "Ulduar" then return true else return false end end if type == "envenom" then if GetZoneText() == "Zul'Aman" or GetZoneText() == "Stranglethorn Vale" or GetZoneText() == "Vault of Archavon" or GetZoneText() == "The Shattered Halls" or GetZoneText() == "Naxxramas" or GetZoneText() == "Black Temple" or GetZoneText() == "The Molten Core" or GetZoneText() == "Icecrown Citadel" or GetZoneText() == "The Obsidian Sanctum" or GetZoneText() == "Drak'Tharon Keep" or GetZoneText() == "Scarlet Monastery" or GetZoneText() == "Trial of the Crusader" or GetZoneText() == "Ragefire Chasm" or GetZoneText() == "The Blood Furnace" or GetZoneText() == "Blackwing Lair" or GetZoneText() == "Ulduar" then return false else return true end end end
functionsloaded = true end

if energycost(48660) and AOE() == false and UnitExists("target") and valid("target", 48660) and cp < 4 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(48660), "target") == 1 then return true end

if Stealth == true and IsStealthed() and UnitLevel("target") == -1 and UnitExists("target") and valid("target", 36554) then --Premeditation-- if not CooldownRemains(14183) then CastSpellByID(14183) return true end
--Shadowstep-- if not CooldownRemains(36554) then CastSpellByID(36554) return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Autotarget script --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitExists("target") == nil and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and SpellIsTargeting() == nil then TargetNearestEnemy() end
